mainText:
I'm a graduate student in design and musicology 
field.
I grew up with Macintosh, and i learned a lot from the products and the 
company,
and there is no doubt that i cultivated an aesthetic cense from them.
so I just want to say thank you to all who work for Apple, and 
especially Mr. Jobs
for releasing so many of amazing products.

RIP Mr.Jobs.
author: Elisa
